plot: William Turner a weary sixty eight year old office janitor who lives a lonely and mundane life, with no family and friends. Never likes to interact with other. Keeps everything to himself. One night at work, William feels a lightning pain in his chest, he falls to the ground... Through looking into his beloved CRYSTAL, His whole life starts to flashback in front of him in reverse. Right before he die...   Written by  Anonymous
title: The Last 3 Minutes
